articles.title: Japan food service firm expands worker training in Southeast Asia - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: Leoc seeks to bring in kitchen staff under visa program amid labor shortage
articles.content:
TOKYO -- Japanese food service company Leoc is expanding a training program in Southeast Asia to help workers learn skills needed to acquire visas to Japan.
Leoc, part of the Onodera group, serves h… [+201 chars]

articles.title: Asia's Biggest Aero Show Begins In Bengaluru Tomorrow: What To Expect - NDTV
articles.description: Asia's largest aero show - Aero India 2023 - will begin on Monday in Bengaluru with the aim of displaying India's growth in aerospace and defence capabilities. Prime Minister Narendra Modi will open the air show, which runs through Friday.
articles.content: <li>The event, the biggest-ever till date, is likely to witness the participation of 98 countries. The Defence Ministers of 32 countries, Air Chiefs of 29 countries and 73 CEOs of global and Indian O… [+832 chars]

articles.title: Sisters scammed of $1250 on Carousell after wanting to buy iPhone for mum - AsiaOne
articles.description: What started off as an act of kindness turned into heartbreak when two sisters, wanting to buy their mother a new iPhone online, ended up getting scammed on Carousell. Speaking to Mothership, the mother Kate (not her real name) said her daughters wanted to ge…
